metadata.title: CVE-2017-5334 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Double free vulnerability in the gnutls_x509_ext_import_proxy function inGnuTLS before 3.3.26 and 3.5.x before 3.5.8 allows remote attackers to haveunspecified impact via crafted policy language information in an X.509certificate with a Proxy Certificate Information extension.

criterions.comment: gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
